slides.title: Welcome to Intermediate Group I
slides.content:
# CMA Intermediate - Group I

Group I covers **financial accounting**, **law**, and **taxation**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Financial Accounting** - Advanced topics
- **Laws & Ethics** - Corporate compliance
- **Direct Tax** - Income tax
- **Cost Accounting** - Basics

## Group I Papers

| Paper | Subject |
|-------|--------|
| 5 | Financial Accounting |
| 6 | Laws & Ethics |
| 7 | Direct Taxation |
| 8 | Cost Accounting |

slides.title: Partnership Accounts
slides.content:
# Partnership Accounting

## Partner's Capital Account

| Debit | Credit |
|-------|--------|
| Drawings | Capital |
| Losses | Interest on capital |
| | Salary |
| | Profit share |

## Profit Distribution

```
1. Interest on capital
2. Partner salaries
3. Commission
4. Share of remaining profit (ratio)
```

## Admission of Partner

- Goodwill treatment
- Revaluation of assets
- New profit sharing ratio

slides.title: Company Accounts
slides.content:
# Corporate Accounting

## Share Capital

| Type | Features |
|------|----------|
| Equity | Voting rights |
| Preference | Fixed dividend |

## Issue of Shares

```
Share Application
Share Allotment
First and Final Call
```

## Forfeiture and Reissue

```
Forfeiture:
Dr Share Capital
Cr Share Forfeiture

Reissue:
Cr Share Capital + premium
```

slides.title: Cash Flow Statement
slides.content:
# AS 3 Cash Flow

## Three Activities

| Activity | Examples |
|----------|----------|
| Operating | Trading |
| Investing | Assets |
| Financing | Capital |

## Indirect Method

```
Net Profit
+ Non-cash expenses
+/- Working capital changes
= Cash from operations
```

## Treatment

| Item | Activity |
|------|----------|
| Dividends paid | Financing |
| Interest paid | Operating or Financing |
| Tax paid | Operating |

slides.title: Corporate Law
slides.content:
# Companies Act 2013

## Board of Directors

| Requirement | Rule |
|-------------|------|
| Minimum | 3 (public), 2 (private) |
| Maximum | 15 (can increase) |
| Independent | 1/3 for listed |

## Meetings

| Type | Frequency |
|------|----------|
| AGM | Within 6 months |
| Board | Every quarter |
| EGM | As needed |

## CSR

- 2% of average net profit
- Qualifying criteria
- CSR committee

slides.title: Income Tax Basics
slides.content:
# Direct Taxation

## Heads of Income

| Head | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Salary | Employment income |
| House property | Rental income |
| PGBP | Business profits |
| Capital gains | Asset sales |
| Other sources | Interest, dividends |

## Tax Calculation

```
Gross Total Income
- Chapter VI-A deductions
= Total Income
x Tax rates
= Tax liability
```

slides.title: Salary Income
slides.content:
# Income from Salary

## Components

| Component | Taxable |
|-----------|--------|
| Basic | Fully |
| DA | Fully |
| HRA | Exempt (limits) |
| Allowances | Varies |

## HRA Exemption

```
Least of:
1. Actual HRA
2. 50%/40% of salary
3. Rent - 10% salary
```

## Perquisites

- Rent-free accommodation
- Company car
- Medical benefits

slides.title: House Property Income
slides.content:
# Property Income

## Annual Value

```
Gross Annual Value
- Municipal taxes paid
= Net Annual Value

NAV
- 30% standard deduction
- Interest on loan
= Income from HP
```

## Self-Occupied Property

- GAV is nil
- Interest deduction up to Rs 2 lakh

## Let-Out Property

| Deduction | Limit |
|-----------|-------|
| Standard | 30% of NAV |
| Interest | No limit |

slides.title: Business Income
slides.content:
# PGBP Income

## Allowable Expenses

| Expense | Treatment |
|---------|----------|
| Rent | Allowed |
| Salary | Allowed |
| Depreciation | As per IT Act |
| Bad debts | Allowed |

## Disallowed Expenses

| Expense | Section |
|---------|--------|
| Personal | Not related to business |
| Penalty | Infringement |
| Wealth tax | Not allowed |

## Depreciation

- Block of assets
- WDV method
- Prescribed rates

slides.title: Capital Gains
slides.content:
# Capital Gains Tax

## Types

| Type | Holding Period |
|------|---------------|
| Short-term | < 12/24/36 months |
| Long-term | > 12/24/36 months |

## Calculation

```
Sale consideration
- Cost of acquisition
- Improvement cost
- Transfer expenses
= Capital gain
```

## Indexation

```
Indexed cost = Cost x (CII of sale / CII of purchase)
```

## Exemptions

- Section 54: Residential house
- Section 54EC: Bonds
- Section 54F: Any asset

slides.title: Cost Accounting Basics
slides.content:
# Introduction to Costing

## Cost Classification

| By Nature | By Behavior |
|-----------|-------------|
| Material | Fixed |
| Labor | Variable |
| Overheads | Semi-variable |

## Cost Elements

```
Prime Cost = Direct Material + Direct Labor

Factory Cost = Prime Cost + Factory Overhead

Cost of Production = Factory Cost + Admin Overhead

Total Cost = CoP + Selling & Distribution
```
